### Request for Proposal (RFP)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Corrections Canada invites proposals for the design of improvements to the interior roads at the Nova Institution in Truro, Nova Scotia.

#### Project Background
-------------

The PSPC is seeking a qualified contractor to design the improvements to the interior roads at the Nova Institution. This project falls under the category of transportation engineering.

#### Tender Details
-------------

*   **Tender Reference Number**: WS4430347397
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4430347397
*   **Publication Date**: 2024-02-08
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-27T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-02-29
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: None

#### Project Scope
-------------

The project involves the design of improvements to the interior roads at the Nova Institution. The scope of work includes:

*   Design of the interior roads
*   Identification of any necessary upgrades to the existing infrastructure

#### Evaluation Criteria
-------------------

The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

*   Technical merit (40%)
*   Price (60%)

#### Important Dates
-------------------

*   Proposals are due on 2024-02-27T14:00:00
*   Contract award is expected to be made on a date to be determined

#### Contact Information
----------------------

*   **Contact Person:** Rachel Miller, PSPC
*   **Email:** rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Phone:** None
*   **Fax:** None

#### Trade Agreements
------------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
